00010 #ifndef _VECTORTEST_H_
00011 #define _VECTORTEST_H_
00012 #include "Vector.h"
00013 #include "Assertion.h"
00014 
00015 template <typename T, int N>
00016 void VectorBase<T, N>::Test() {
00017     Vector3::TestOperators();
00018     Vector3::TestDot();
00019     Vector3::TestCross();
00020     Vector3::TestAngle();
00021     Vector3::TestReflect();
00022     Vector3::TestInterpolate();
00023     Vector3::TestDirection();
00024 }
00025 
00026 
00027 template <typename T, int N>
00028 void VectorBase<T, N>::TestDirection() {
00029     Vector3 a(0,1,0);
00030     Vector3 b(0,2,0);
00031     ASSERT(a.hasSameDirectionAs(b));
00032 }
00033 
00034 template <typename T, int N>
00035 void VectorBase<T, N>::TestDot() {
00036     Vector3 a(0,1,0);
00037     Vector3 b(0,0,1);
00038     Real d = a.dotProduct(b);
00039     ASSERT_EQ(d, 0);
00040     ASSERT_EQ(d, a.length() * b.length() * Math::Cos(Math::PI / 2.0f));
00041     
00042     a = Vector3(0.0f,1.0f,0.0f);
00043     b = Vector3(0.0f,1.0f,1.0f);
00044     d = a.dotProduct(b);
00045     ASSERT_EQ(d, 1);
00046     ASSERT_EQ(d, a.length() * b.length() * Math::Cos(Math::PI / 4.0f));
00047 }
00048 
00049 template <typename T, int N>
00050 void VectorBase<T, N>::TestCross() {
00051     Vector3 a(1,0,0);
00052     Vector3 b(0,1,0);
00053     a.crossProduct(b);
00054     ASSERT_EQ(a.crossProduct(b), Vector3(0,0,1));
00055     ASSERT_EQ(b.crossProduct(a), Vector3(0,0,-1));
00056 }
00057 
00058 template <typename T, int N>
00059 void VectorBase<T, N>::TestAngle() {
00060     Vector3 a(0,1,0);
00061     Vector3 b(0,0,1);
00062     ASSERT_EQ(a.radiansBetween(b), Math::PI / 2.0f);
00063     ASSERT_EQ(a.degreesBetween(b), 90);
00064     
00065     Vector3 c(0,1,0);
00066     Vector3 d(0,1,1);
00067     ASSERT_EQ(c.radiansBetween(d), Math::PI / 4.0f);
00068     ASSERT_EQ(c.degreesBetween(d), 45);
00069 }
00070 
00071 template <typename T, int N>
00072 void VectorBase<T, N>::TestReflect() {
00073     Vector3 a(0.0f,-1.0f,-1.0f);
00074     Vector3 b(0.0f,1.0f,0.0f);
00075     Vector3 c(0.0f,1.0f,-1.0f);
00076     ASSERT_EQ(a.getReflected(b), c);
00077 }
00078 
00079 template <typename T, int N>
00080 void VectorBase<T, N>::TestInterpolate() {
00081     Vector3 a(10,10,10);
00082     Vector3 b(20,0,10);
00083     Vector3 c(234,35,29043);
00084     
00085     c = a.getInterpolated(b, .25);
00086     ASSERT_EQ(c, Vector3(12.5,7.5,10));
00087     
00088     c = a.getInterpolated(b, .75);
00089     ASSERT_EQ(c, Vector3(17.5,2.5,10));
00090     
00091     c = a.getInterpolated(b, .5);
00092     ASSERT_EQ(c, Vector3(15,5,10));
00093     
00094     c = a.getInterpolated(b, 0);
00095     ASSERT_EQ(c, Vector3(10,10,10));
00096     
00097     c = a.getInterpolated(b, 1);
00098     ASSERT_EQ(c, Vector3(20,0,10));
00099 }
00100 
00101 template <typename T, int N>
00102 void VectorBase<T, N>::TestOperators() {
00103     Vector3 test1, test2, test3, test4;
00104     
00105     {    //Test ==
00106         test1 = Vector3(1.0f, 0.0f, -1.0f);
00107         test2 = Vector3(1.0f, 0.0f, -1.0f);
00108         test3 = Vector3(1.00001f, -0.0f, -1.00001f);
00109         ASSERT(test1 == test2);
00110         ASSERT(test1 == test3);
00111         ASSERT(test2 == test3);
00112     }
00113 
00114     {    //Test !=
00115         test1 = Vector3(1.0f, 0.0f, -1.0f);
00116         test3 = Vector3(1.0f, 1.0f, -1.0f);
00117         ASSERT(test1 != test3);
00118         ASSERT(test1 != Vector3());
00119         ASSERT(test3 != Vector3());
00120     }
00121 
00122     {    //Test =
00123         test1 = Vector3(1.0f, 0.0f, -1.0f);
00124         test2 = Vector3(1.0f, 1.0f, -1.0f);
00125         test2 = test1;
00126         ASSERT_EQ(test1, test2);
00127     }
00128     
00129     {    //Test []
00130         test1 = Vector3(1.0f, 2.0f, 1.0f);
00131         ASSERT_EQ(test1[0], 1.0f);
00132         ASSERT_EQ(test1[1], 2.0f);
00133         ASSERT_EQ(test1[2], 1.0f);
00134         
00135         test1[0] = -2.0f;
00136         test1[1] = -1.0f;
00137         test1[2] = -2.0f;
00138         ASSERT_EQ(test1, Vector3(-2.0f, -1.0f, -2.0f));
00139         ASSERT_EQ(test1[0], -2.0f);
00140         ASSERT_EQ(test1[1], -1.0f);
00141         ASSERT_EQ(test1[2], -2.0f);
00142         
00143     }
00144     
00145     {    //Test /
00146         test1 = Vector3(1.0f, 0.0f, -200.0f);
00147         test2 = test1 / 2.0f;
00148         ASSERT_EQ(test2, Vector3(.5f, 0.0f, -100.0f));
00149     }
00150     
00151     {    //Test *
00152         test1 = Vector3(1.0f, 0.0f, -.5f);
00153         test2 = test1 * 2.0f;
00154         ASSERT_EQ(test2, Vector3(2.0f, 0.0f, -1.0f));
00155     }
00156     
00157     {    //Test -
00158         test1 = Vector3(1.0f, 0.0f, .5f);
00159         test2 = Vector3(0.0f, .1f, -10.0f);
00160         test3 = test1 - test2;
00161         test4 = test2 - test1;
00162         ASSERT_EQ(test3, Vector3(1.0f, -.1f, 10.5f));
00163         ASSERT_EQ(test4, Vector3(-1.0f, .1f, -10.5f));
00164     }
00165     
00166     {    //Test +
00167         test1 = Vector3(1.0f, 0.0f, -.5f);
00168         test2 = Vector3(0.0f, .1f, -10.0f);
00169         test3 = test1 + test2;
00170         test4 = test2 + test1;
00171         ASSERT_EQ(test3, Vector3(1.0f, .1f, -10.5f));
00172         ASSERT_EQ(test4, Vector3(1.0f, .1f, -10.5f));
00173     }
00174     
00175     {    //Test - Real
00176         test1 = Vector3(1.0f, 0.0f, .5f);
00177         test2 = test1 - .5f;
00178         ASSERT_EQ(test2, Vector3(.5f, -.5f, 0.0f));
00179     }
00180     
00181     {    //Test + Real
00182         test1 = Vector3(1.0f, 0.0f, .5f);
00183         test2 = test1 + .5f;
00184         ASSERT_EQ(test2, Vector3(1.5f, .5f, 1.0f));
00185     }
00186     
00187     {    //Test /=
00188         test1 = Vector3(1.0f, 0.0f, -200.0f);
00189         test1 /= 2;
00190         ASSERT_EQ(test1, Vector3(.5f, 0.0f, -100.0f));
00191     }
00192     
00193     {    //Test *=
00194         test1 = Vector3(1.0f, 0.0f, -.5f);
00195         test1 *= 2;
00196         ASSERT_EQ(test1, Vector3(2.0f, 0.0f, -1.0f));
00197     }
00198     
00199     {    //Test -=
00200         test1 = Vector3(1.0f, 0.0f, .5f);
00201         test2 = Vector3(0.0f, .1f, -10.0f);
00202         test3 = test2;
00203         test4 = test1;
00204         test1 -= test2;
00205         test3 -= test4;
00206         ASSERT_EQ(test1, Vector3(1.0f, -.1f, 10.5f));
00207         ASSERT_EQ(test3, Vector3(-1.0f, .1f, -10.5f));
00208     }
00209     
00210     {    //Test +=
00211         test1 = Vector3(1.0f, 0.0f, -.5f);
00212         test2 = Vector3(0.0f, .1f, -10.0f);
00213         test3 = test2;
00214         test4 = test1;
00215         test1 += test2;
00216         test3 += test4;
00217         ASSERT_EQ(test1, Vector3(1.0f, .1f, -10.5f));
00218         ASSERT_EQ(test3, Vector3(1.0f, .1f, -10.5f));
00219     }
00220     
00221     {    //Test -= Real
00222         test1 = Vector3(1.0f, 0.0f, .5f);
00223         test1 -= .5f;
00224         ASSERT_EQ(test1, Vector3(.5f, -.5f, 0.0f));
00225     }
00226     
00227     {    //Test +=
00228         test1 = Vector3(1.0f, 0.0f, .5f);
00229         test1 += .5f;
00230         ASSERT_EQ(test1, Vector3(1.5, .5, 1));
00231     }
00232 }
